mapper.select: select cFood_C, cFood_N, cLitCls_C, cLitCls_N, sUnit, nPrc, nQty, nAmt, nDisAmt, eSuitFlag, cSuitBill, cSuitName, eRetSendFlag, sRetSendRemark, cPresentBackMan from ${com}.d_t_food_bills where cBill_C = #{billC}

select sun.CLITCLS_N , sun.CFOOD_C , sun.CFOOD_N , sun.x itemCount, case when sun.cfood_c is not null then ${thesum} end tableCount, case when sun.cfood_c is not null then round(sun.x/${thesum},4)*100 end ctr, case when sun.cfood_c is null then round(sun.x/( select sum(case when cfood_c is not null then sun.x else 0 end) from sun ),4)*100 end gdp, p.item_price salePrice, money.stockPrice, case when p.item_price is null then null when p.item_price = 0 then null else round((p.item_price-money.stockPrice)/p.item_price,4) end stockGdp, money.benchPrice, case when p.item_price is null then null when p.item_price = 0 then null else round((p.item_price-money.benchPrice)/p.item_price,4) end benchGdp from (select a.clitcls_c clitcls_c, a.CLITCLS_N CLITCLS_N, trim(a.CFOOD_C) CFOOD_C, c.item_name CFOOD_N, sum(a.NQTY) x from ${com}.D_T_FOOD_BILLS A inner join ${com}.d_t_food_bill b on a.CBILL_C = b.CBILL_C inner join ${com}.D_T2_ITEM_META c on a.cfood_c = c.item_id where b.DTBILLTIME >= #{startDate} and b.DTBILLTIME <= #{endDate} and a.clitcls_c not in ('0501','3036','3033','4041') and c.item_name not like '%测试%' and a.NQTY != 0 group by a.clitcls_c,trim(a.CFOOD_C) with rollup)sun left join ( select t.THERAPY_ID , sum(round(t.ITEM_GROSS_COUNT*p.item_price,4)) stockPrice, sum(round(t.ITEM_GROSS_COUNT*p2.item_price,4)) benchPrice from ${com}.D_T2_ITEM_META m left join ${com}.d_t2_therapy t on m.ITEM_ID = t.THERAPY_ID left join ${com}.D_T2_ITEM_PRICE p on t.ITEM_ID = p.ITEM_ID and p.IS_CURRENT = 1 and p.PRICE_TYPE = 'BENCHMARK' left join ${com}.D_T2_ITEM_PRICE p2 on t.ITEM_ID = p2.ITEM_ID and p2.IS_CURRENT = 1 and p2.PRICE_TYPE = 'PURCHASE' where m.ITEM_TYPE = 'PRODUCT' group by t.THERAPY_ID )money on sun.CFOOD_C = money.THERAPY_ID left join ${com}.D_T2_ITEM_PRICE p on sun.CFOOD_C = p.item_id where p.price_type = 'SALE' and sun.x > 0 order by sun.clitcls_c desc,sun.CLITCLS_N desc
